column5: I did Undulator last year, TMR last year and booked in for southern crossing this year, Jumbo-holdsworth this year too.

In the last couple years, Roller Coaster Run (Melbourne) 2015, Goat 2014, Holdsworth Jumbo 2014, Kaweka Challenge 2013, Tussock Traverse 2013.  Previous to 2002 ran various lengths of the Kaweka 4 times, Holdsworth 4 times, bunch of Rogaines.

The longest run distance wise I've done is the Rotorua marathon, but have recently ran round Lake Waikeramoana and have done lots of long tramps spending 10-12 hours per day on my feet. I'm friends with Huw Crossweller and he's encouraged me to sign up :)
Only previous race I've done is the Tararua Mountain Race (Southern Xing) in March this year. Time was 6hrs, 4mins.

Tarawera 100km in 2011 (14 hrs), 2012 (13hrs15mins), 70km 2014 (not a good year)and 60km in 2015(7hrs 57mins). The Goat 2010 (3hrs 40min), 2012, 2013 (3hrs 37mins), 2014 (3hrs 24mins). Bedrock 50 2012 (7hrs 11mins). Attempted Kaweka Klassic 50km in 2014 pulled out at 42kms due to exhaustion.
The Goat 2104 4.45, Aurora marathon  31/05/2015 5.30, xterra long 2015 3.10, around the bays 2015 wellington 2.09
Previous races include, Jumbo-Holdsworth, Tauhara, Podium Rotorua half, The big O.

Triple Peaks 08
Ironmaori 1/2 IM 09
Rotorua Marathon 13
5x 1/2 marathons
Auckland & Rotorua 1/2 IM
5 or so kaweka challenges . Xterra trail runs ,Some on road marathons full and half. Plenty of bush bashing!!!
